title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 731.15 - Review of certain protective orders issued pursuant to CPL 245.70
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 731.15 - Review of certain protective orders issued pursuant to CPL 245.70

State Regulations

Expedited review pursuant to C PL 245.70(6) of a
protective order relating to the name, address, contact information or
statements of a person (C PL 245.70[6][a]) shall be sought by application made
by order to show cause in accordance with section
731.4
of this Part and within two
business days of the adverse or partially adverse ruling. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
731.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
